values:
Yeah! 15 more mins and I'll call it a day.
This is the moment that i am looking forward. Phew! 

Cya~ Snow.

Snow,
   Haha~ today, 1255h,finally i got my pay... hehee.. now i am wondering how am i gonna spend it. As u noe, the veri first pay i received from this job, so must celebrate manz~
  i promised to buy somthing 4 Janelle,  at first she requested for a ticket to the movie "cats n dogs" ... thats alrite for mi, but dunno y she suddenly wants a 1000 pieces jizsaw puzzle. :( hmmm... this may cost alot leh~  haiz, but nvm la~ once a while is ok for mi. cos a man has to keep his words! haa... (or maybe get her a 100~500 pieces if 1000 is too ex.)  :)

haa.~ Cheers manz!

Hi Snow, 
    we meet again! Haiz~ today was a moody day for mi. Dunno how to describe; or maybe lack of sleep la~ I began to feel tired of the work that i am doing now. :(
Part of the reason is that the SUPER long travel time which is making mi sick of it. Hmmm... maybe i shouldnt complain so much, who ask mi not sleeping early; but i juz cant miss my favourite shows. My schedule seem so pack that i hardly sleep. Example: Monday got my favorite Jap show "Love Generation", but yesterday was the last episode already...("Food Fight" part 2 will be next); then followed by the "Shi(2) Zhi(4) Lu(4) Kou(3)", a 11:30 taiwan celebrity show.( this i juz cant miss it! Veri funny~) This is only my Monday programes, there r lots of programme for the following days.~

The other reason... Arrggh~ Is that i havnt get my July's pay. The $420 monthly allowance is my only motivation that keeps mi wakes up early for work. and yet the NTU finance department kept on delaying the payment day. Haiz~ really no mood already ar...
but what keeps mi going throughout this 2 months was that i can d/l and watch all latest movies on threate which indeed save mi a lot of money. hehee... this is so called "ku(3) zhong(1) dai(4) le(4)" :D

So much 4 todae Snow~ u r the one whom i share my woes n one more person who always wants mi to update my journal. she is a veri profound gal; dun wwant to mention name la~ Snow i think u shoud noe who la... (hahaha... no offence manz!)

~han~

Dear Diary,
     This is the veri first page of my journal(a place where i reveal all my secrets for my "FRIEND" to know? or a place where my woes reside.) U are created b'cos of a friend of mine, Janelle, who introduced this livejournal to mi. 
     Diary Diary! hmm... should I give u a name? Ya,i think i'll call u "Snow" then; cos I like snow. :)
     So Snow, hope u can accompany mi throughout the year and let our journey begins...

~han~
